entry.def: Heavenly things are things that are connected with the religious idea of heaven.

example.ex: ...heavenly beings whose function it is to serve God.

entry.tran: 无比美好的;极令人愉快的
entry.def: Something that is heavenly is very pleasant and enjoyable.

example.ex: The idea of spending two weeks with him may seem heavenly.
example.tran: 和他一起度过两周的想法听起来似乎十分美好。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or inhabiting a divine heaven;
2. of or relating to the sky;
3. of or belonging to heaven or god
